title: FB Giza and Griffith Gothic
content:
I would like to know if Giza would go well with Griffith Gothic for a report.  
Giza would be used as Headings and Griffith Gothic as Body Text.  
Critiques appreciated.
author: Alienontherun

comments.content:
I can see it working as long as the weights are different.

- Lex
Thanks for your opinion. Much Appreciated.
